dt: {bc}a substance or preparation used in treating disease
{bc}the science and art dealing with the maintenance of health and the prevention, alleviation, or cure of disease

dt.t: She's interested in a career in {wi}medicine{/wi}.

dt: {bc}the branch of medicine concerned with the nonsurgical treatment of disease
{bc}a substance (such as a drug or potion) used to treat something other than disease
{bc}an object held in traditional American Indian belief to give control over natural or magical forces

shortdef: a substance or preparation used in treating disease
the science and art dealing with the maintenance of health and the prevention, alleviation, or cure of disease

dt: {bc}a heavy usually large ball used especially in conditioning and strengthening exercises

at an altitude of 12,013 feet (3662 meters)
